attributes.action: bring back national service for all those who are above the legal school leaving age upto the age of 20
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to bring back national service if there is any chance of saving Britain    it's about time people learned to respect each other and other people's things and not take things for granted with the making of the national service been brought back would solve the MOD problem's of recruiting also solve the problem of ill discipline within the UK as the national service will hopefully discipline youngster's also it will bring respect back to the uniformed public services not seeing them been spat on an abused like we see today i say bring it back yes it may cost a bomb at the start but after that you will start to see the reason of it and the good effects so please please please sign here and get this to the top

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
